hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="ruby" published_version="2.5.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
# Install dependencies sudo zypper install -y bison libopenssl-devel libffi-devel readline-devel zlib-devel gdbm-devel ncurses-devel tcl-devel tk-devel sqlite3-devel gcc make awk wget tar bzip2 subversion gcc-c++ binutils-devel automake autoconf libtool # Set environment variables export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
#Install GCC 4.8.2 export WORK_DIR=`pwd` cd $WORK_DIR wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gcc/gcc-4.8.2/gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 tar xvf gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 cd gcc-4.8.2 ./contrib/download_prerequisites mkdir $WORK_DIR/gccbuild cd $WORK_DIR/gccbuild ../gcc-4.8.2/configure --prefix="/opt/gcc" --enable-shared --with-system-zlib --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit --enable-checking --enable-gnu-indirect-function --enable-languages="c,c++" --disable-bootstrap --disable-multilib make all sudo make install export PATH=/opt/gcc/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gcc/lib64:/opt/gcc/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH sudo mv /usr/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc.bkup sudo ln -s /opt/gcc/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc gcc --version
#Build openssl cd $WORK_DIR wget ftp://ftp.openssl.org/source/old/1.0.2/openssl-1.0.2.tar.gz tar -xf openssl-1.0.2.tar.gz cd openssl-1.0.2 ./config --prefix=/usr --openssldir=/usr/local/openssl shared make sudo make install openssl version
#Build curl cd $WORK_DIR sudo rm -rf curl git clone git://github.com/curl/curl.git cd curl git checkout curl-7_52_1 ./buildconf ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --with-ssl --disable-shared make && sudo make install export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/lib64 export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
#Generate ca-bundle.crt for curl echo insecure >> $HOME/.curlrc wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/curl/curl/curl-7_53_0/lib/mk-ca-bundle.pl perl mk-ca-bundle.pl -k export SSL_CERT_FILE=`pwd`/ca-bundle.crt rm $HOME/.curlrc
# Download Ruby 2.5.0 source code wget http://cache.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/2.5/ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz tar zxf ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz cd ruby-2.5.0
# Configure and build Ruby ./configure LDFLAGS='-L$homedir/openssl' --with-openssl-include=$WORK_DIR/openssl/include --with-openssl-dir=/usr/ make
# Install Ruby sudo -E make install
# Test the results make test
# Verify Ruby
ruby -v ruby -v | grep 2.5.0 gem env
